titles: A proclamation, for a national fast.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
publisher: Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,
notes: Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh the tenth day of May one thousand six hundred ninety and eight years, and of Our Reign the tenth year.
Signed: Gilb Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
